name: Intellimus
overview: This Apple Tablet was rumored to be oannunced for several years now, so the Buzz was actually started long ago. At every stage apple was to announce a new iPhone everyone talked about a coming Tablet.I’m not sure whether McGraw-Hill executive’s slip was intentional or not, however This will even make the buzz larger so it’s making a good service to Apple than any good I guess.Regarding the Tablet itself I believe that this can be a possible laptops & netbooks killer & i’d love to get my hand on it once it is released at last. I’m sure it will support iPhone apps & such which will enable users to purchase & use apps anytime & anywhere. The possibilities of such applications to run on a Tablet platform are endless and I’m sure we’ll see many companies focus in this area as many jumped on deck due to the iPhone Buzz.
